item.title: EP 67 - The Bath Township Massacre
item.itunes:title: The Bath Township Massacre
item.description:
Is Post Malone cursed by a ghost? And then we travel back in time to learn about the Bath Township Massacre.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Post Malone is a record breaking musician who has a recent spate of bad luck. From plane trouble to home invasions, his life seems to be in danger. Is it possible that he has been cursed by the Dybbuk Box?

Then we meet a murderous man who has a taste for vengeance. How can one man get back at an entire town in a single day? Lots and lots of dynamite

‘GHOST ADVENTURES’ HOST SAYS POST MALONE MIGHT ACTUALLY BE CURSED

https://www.altpress.com/news/ghost-adventures-zak-bagans-post-malone-cursed/

Is Post Malone’s Recent Bad Luck the Result of a Strange Curse Unleashed During His Ghost Adventures Appearance?

https://www.spin.com/2018/09/post-malone-strange-curse-ghost-adventures-appearance/

The Dibbuk Box

http://www.dibbukbox.com/story.htm

Watch Post Malone Play Around With Cursed Object In Haunted Museum

https://www.complex.com/music/2018/09/post-malone-might-have-got-himself-cursed

Dybbuk

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dybbuk

Dybbuk Box

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dybbuk_box

The Haunted Dybbuk Box

https://skeptoid.com/episodes/4428

Bath School Massacre

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bath_School_disaster

Bath School bombing: Oldest surviving student recalls ‘how awful it was’

https://www.lansingstatejournal.com/story/news/local/2017/05/11/bath-school-bombing-oldest-surviving-student-recalls-how-awful/101194330/

The 1927 Bombing That Remains America’s Deadliest School Massacre

Read more: https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/1927-bombing-remains-americas-deadliest-school-massacre-180963355/#arqGrts46XXiIBu2.99

22 things you may not have known about the 1927 Bath school massacre

https://www.mlive.com/news/index.ssf/2017/05/10_things_you_probably_didnt_k.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
